#summary The navigator.appVersion property
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property

== Values ==

The `navigator.appVersion` property returns a string.
  * [BrowserFamilyFirefox Firefox] returns `"5.0"` followed by your operating system platform and language.  Example: `"5.0 (Windows; en-US)"`
  * [BrowserFamilyMSIE Internet Explorer] returns `"4.0 (compatible; "` followed by your browser version, your operating system version, and a list of installed system components.  Example: `"4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 5.1; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; InfoPath.1; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.0.04506.30)"`
  * [BrowserFamilySafari Safari] returns ...
  * [BrowserFamilyOpera Opera] returns your browser version, followed by your operating system version and language.  Example: `"9.21 (Windows NT 5.1; U; en)"`

This property is read-only.
